languages.text: "Я..." {n}Караэля явно застигли врасплох этим заявлением. Он отшагивает назад, оглядывая кабалитов возле себя.{/n}
"I..." {n}Kharael is clearly taken aback by this statement. He draws back, glancing at the Kabalites around him.{/n}

languages.text: "Ich ..." {n}Kharael ist offenkundig erstaunt von dieser Aussage. Er bewegt sich ein Stück nach hinten und sieht die Mitglieder der Kabale um sich herum an.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}Kharael is clearly taken aback by this statement. He draws back, glancing at the Kabalites around him.{/n}

traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: “我……”{n}很显然，这句话说到了卡瑞尔心里。他向后退了一步，瞥了一眼周围的阴谋团战士。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}Kharael is clearly taken aback by this statement. He draws back, glancing at the Kabalites around him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我……”{n}很显然，这句话说到了卡瑞尔心里。他向后退了一步，瞥了一眼周围的阴谋团战士。{/n}
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: « Je... » {n}Kharael est visiblement pris de court. Il recule, jetant un coup d'œil aux Kabalites autour de lui.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}Kharael is clearly taken aback by this statement. He draws back, glancing at the Kabalites around him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je... » {n}Kharael est visiblement pris de court. Il recule, jetant un coup d'œil aux Kabalites autour de lui.{/n}
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: «Yo...». {n}Kharael queda sorprendido por la declaración. Retrocede, mirando a los Kabalistas que lo rodean.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}Kharael is clearly taken aback by this statement. He draws back, glancing at the Kabalites around him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Yo...». {n}Kharael queda sorprendido por la declaración. Retrocede, mirando a los Kabalistas que lo rodean.{/n}
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: 「私は…」{n}カラエルはこの言葉に明らかに動揺している。彼の周りにいるカバライトを見回しつつ後退る。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}Kharael is clearly taken aback by this statement. He draws back, glancing at the Kabalites around him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「私は…」{n}カラエルはこの言葉に明らかに動揺している。彼の周りにいるカバライトを見回しつつ後退る。{/n}
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: "Ben." {n}Kharael'in bu söylev karşısında afalladığı açık. Çevresindeki Kabalistlere bakışlar atarak geri çekiliyor.{/n}
